name: Spin To Win (Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2)
description:
Controls:
    WASD or Arrow Keys - movement
    Z - shoot
    X - stop ship from spinning
    C - reset ship rotation

Mechanics:
   Spin To Win is like a tradition bullet hell space shooter, but you can collide with enemies to make your ship spin. This allows you to shoot in multiple directions, and the faster you spin, the faster you shoot. (the chaos is with the bullets and the spinning mechanic)

The game works, but the enemy spawner has a bug, so waves after wave 2 take a while to appear. There are 6 waves in total.
